author: Katie Pedersen,Melissa Mancini
title: Ontario's long-term care workers still working at multiple facilities as B.C. clamps down
description: Families with loved ones in long-term care homes have been locked out for weeks as the facilities try to contain the coronavirus pandemic that has had a devastating toll on their residents. Yet new outbreaks continue to emerge, as staff members continue to wo…
content:
It was a tough lesson learned by the Lynn Valley Care Centre in North Vancouver, the long-term care home in British Columbia that was the first and is still among the hardest hit by a coronavirus outbreak in Canada.
The facility that recorded the country's f… [+7022 chars]
